page.title: 04CLUBS HOPE YOUTH CLUBS
page.content: As the playgroup is well supported so is the Junior Youth Club, with 28 members from 7-11 years. The members have a variety of indoor amenities to enjoy,table games,skittles as well as a coffee bar selling squash, crisps and biscuits.The weekly subscription is 10p. In the summer members can enjoy rounders,cricket and football in the adjacent school field. Outings are organised throughout the year.Ice skating in Telford is a favourite, along with roller skating and visits to a safari park and of course a pantomime visit at Christmas. Parents are encouraged by the leader to become involved with most activities. A Senior Youth Club is also run for the over 11s on much the same lines and is equally well supported.
